title: Louvre Museum crown left crushed but 'intact' after raid
summary_full: The Paris museum issues the first pictures of the crown since the theft, saying it was left "badly deformed".
summary_public: The Paris museum issues the first pictures of the crown since the theft, saying it was left "badly deformed".

FR.label: neutral
